name: Mafia King (itch)
description:
Level 1: Start with one soldier. Hire drug dealers, thieves, and bookies to get cash. Hire enough soldiers to start an army and promote members to  captains.

Level 2: Some bad apples will start to steal from you. Hire killers and enforcers to keep your members in line. Struggle to keep your members happy.

Level 3: Your strength in members and power starts to get noticed. The police start to harass you. Other Mafia Clans begin to war with you.

Level 4: Wars! In-laws! The Feds! A wife! Kids!

Level 5: You become the most powerful Mafia King in the world!

CLICK HERE.
